meta.description: Wesley J. Smith joined Laura Ingraham to discuss the disturbing calls by many to mandate the COVID-19 vaccine and to create "vaccine passports."

title: Wesley J. Smith Joins Laura Ingraham to Discuss ‘Vaccine Passports’
cleaned_text: Wesley J. Smith joined Laura Ingraham to discuss the disturbing calls by many to mandate the COVID-19 vaccine and to create “vaccine passports.” Smith breaks down how such propositions would threaten our civil liberties.
